bibl.title: Hellenism and the Rise of Rome. Translation: A.M. Sheridan Smith and Carla Wartenburg. (The Weidenfeld and Nicolson Universal History. 6.)
bibl.seg: Bengtson Hermann, Werner Caskel, Philippe Derchain, Maurice Meuleau, Morton Smith and Pierre Grimal, Hellenism and the Rise of Rome. Translation: A.M. Sheridan Smith and Carla Wartenburg. (The Weidenfeld and Nicolson Universal History. 6.)
London - New York, Weidenfeld and Nicolson, Delacorte, 1968-1969, 8°, xiv-418 pp., 5 cartes et 47 figg. sur 32 pll.
Bengtson Caskel Derchain Meuleau Smith Grimal Sheridan Smith Wartenburg
